column2: The Sunken Temple? Oh yeah, everyone around here’s heard about it. But since no one’s ever been there, who can say if it actually exists?
There are so many stories and legends about the ocean. My absolute favorite would have to be [f2]The Quacho Queen[/f].
Things have been pretty rough around here lately, haven’t they?
I wonder what the deal was with those machines.
Maybe one day, future generations will talk about everything that’s happened here—in THEIR legends.
